ARABIC: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Know that your wealth and children are a trial and that there is an immense reward with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Know that your worldly possessions and your children are just a temptation, and that God has greater rewards with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Know well that your belongings and your children are but a trial, and that with Allah there is a mighty reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Know that your possessions and children are a temptation for you and that God has the greatest reward (for the righteous ones).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And know that your wealth and your children are a test, and that with Allah is an immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And know that your possessions and your children are but a trial and that surely, with Allah is a mighty reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And know that your property and your children are a temptation, and that Allah is He with Whom there is a mighty reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and know that your wealth and your children are a trial, and that with God is a mighty wage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And know that your possessions and your children are a test, and that with Allah is immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Know that your wealth and children are a trial and that there is an immense reward with God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And know that your riches and your children are but a temptation, and that verily Allah: with Him is a mighty hire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Know that your possessions and children are only a test, and that Allah—with Him is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And know ye that your possessions and your progeny are but a trial; and that it is Allah with Whom lies your highest reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And know that your possessions and your children are but a trial and that surely with Allah is a mighty reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Know that your children and your wealth are but a temptation, and that the reward with Allah is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And know that your possessions and your children are a test, and that God possesses an immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And know that your properties and your children are but a trial and that Allah has with Him a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:28] And know that your wealth and your children are a trial, for you, impeding you from the concerns of the Hereafter; and that with God is a tremendous wage, so do not forfeit it by giving [undue] attention to wealth and children, acting treacherously for the sake of [preserving] them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And know) this address is directed at Abu Lubabah (that your possessions and your children) in the Banu Qurayzah (are a test) an affliction, (and that with Allah is immense reward) an abundant reward in Paradise through jihad.
